![](../ic?i=x&c3=%234C4C4C&c2=transparent)

Due to the inclement weather, Waste Connections has been unable to run. They anticipate running tomorrow, Wednesday the 27th, and will be running a day behind with pickups. They are sending two truckw, and will start with what was left from last Friday and Monday. Please keep your cans placed out, and know they may be a couple days behind. We appreciate your patience and apologize for any inconvenience. Stay safe and warm!

Candidate Eligibility Requirements (Local Gov’t Code, Section 22.032):

**Mayor:**

* Residence – 1 year in state prior to the filing deadline; 1 year in city prior to election day
* Age 18
* **Must be a registered voter in the City of Madisonville by the filing deadline**

**Council Member:**

* Residence – 1 year in state prior to the filing deadline; 6 months in city prior to filing deadline
* Age 18
* **Must be a registered voter in City of Madisonville by the filing deadline**

**What is a Passkey?**  
Imagine signing into your account as easily as unlocking your phone—no more worrying about remembering or typing a password. A passkey is a secure digital key that uses the safety features in your device to keep your account protected. It’s designed to be both simple to use and highly secure.  
Ready to experience a simpler, safer sign-in? Click the button above to create your passkey now.
